projectList02: The list of Installation projects appears.
step1CreateProject01: Press the **+** button from the list.
step1CreateProject03: Select the center that will handle and carry out the project.
step1CreateProject04: Select the project manager for the selected center.
step2CreateProject01: Select the client that will be the installation target.
step2CreateProject02: Select the location where the installation will take place.
step2CreateProject03: If there is no installation address, press the **Add** button to register it.
step2CreateProject05: After entering the address, when you click on the **Search** button, it will appear on the map.
step3CreateProject01: Press the **Save** button for the commissioning project.
